trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs)" />, <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.OnPaint(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs,System.Boolean)" />, <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.OnPaint(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs)" />, and <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.OnPaint(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Boolean,System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme,System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner)" /> methods and any overridden versions of <see langword="OnPaint" /> in classes that derive from them, when they are drawn on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Udostępnia dane dla <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs)" />, <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.OnPaint(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs,System.Boolean)" />, <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.OnPaint(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs)" />, i <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.OnPaint(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Boolean,System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme,System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner)" /> metody i wszystkie zastąpione wersje <see langword="OnPaint" /> w klasach pochodzących od nich narysować na powierzchni projektu przepływu pracy.

trans-unit.source: `OnPaint` method calls occur when an activity designer, glyph, or connector is redrawn on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: `OnPaint` wywołania metody wystąpić, gdy Projektant działań, symbolu lub łącznika jest odświeżana na powierzchni projektu przepływu pracy.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs> specifies the graphics to use to draw the object and the clipping rectangle in which to draw it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs> Określa grafiki, aby narysować obiekt i prostokątny wycinek do rysowania go.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the item.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> Używany do rysowania elementu.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the rectangle in which to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> Reprezentujący prostokąta do rysowania.

trans-unit.source: The view port in which to draw.
trans-unit.target: Port widoku do rysowania.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> associated with the object to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> Skojarzony z obiektem do rysowania.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> class with the specified graphics, clipping rectangle, viewport and designer theme.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> z określonym grafiki, prostokątny wycinek okienka ekranu i projektanta kompozycji.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> associated with the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> skojarzone z powierzchni projektu przepływu pracy.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> that contains theme information for the workflow.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> Zawierający informacje motywu przepływu pracy.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> is used to describe workflow look and feel properties, such as colors, styles and backgrounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> Jest używany do opisu właściwości wyglądu i działania przepływu pracy, takich jak kolory, style i tła.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> in which to draw.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> do rysowania.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that describes the area to draw.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> opisujący powierzchni do rysowania.

trans-unit.source: The area described by the clipping rectangle is the area on the screen that will be redrawn using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> supplied by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Obszar opisanego przez Prostokątny wycinek jest obszar na ekranie będą rysowane przy użyciu <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> dostarczonych przez <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> skojarzone z projektantem.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> that describes the designer look and feel.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> Opisujący projektanta wyglądu i działania.

trans-unit.source: If a designer has an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> associated with it, the designer will use the look and feel properties described by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> to paint itself.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli ma projektanta <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> skojarzonych z nim, Projektant użyje właściwości wyglądu i działania opisanego przez <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> namalować samej siebie.

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> is associated with the designer, the designer will use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> to repaint its look and feel properties.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli nie <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> skojarzonego przy użyciu projektanta użyje projektanta <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> do odświeżenia właściwości wyglądu i działania.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the item on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> używany do rysowania elementu na powierzchni projektu przepływu pracy.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the item on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> Używany do rysowania elementu na powierzchni projektu przepływu pracy.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> provides methods for drawing objects on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> udostępnia metody do rysowania obiektów na powierzchnię projektu przepływu pracy.
